value_claims.claim_description: Exscientia accelerated drug design by up to 70 percent compared with industry benchmarks using generative AI throughout the design-make-test-learn cycle.
value_claims.source_quote: Exscientia has accelerated drug design by up to 70 percent while decreasing capital cost by 80 percent, compared with industry benchmarks.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The acceleration is explicitly attributed to using generative AI with other tools in the DMTL cycle for drug design.

value_claims.claim_title: 80% reduction in capital cost for drug design
value_claims.claim_description: Exscientia decreased capital cost by 80 percent compared with industry benchmarks using generative AI and automated processes in drug discovery.
value_claims.source_quote: Exscientia has accelerated drug design by up to 70 percent while decreasing capital cost by 80 percent, compared with industry benchmarks.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cost reduction directly attributed to generative AI use in the synthesis-aware, iterative approach built on AWS.

value_claims.claim_description: Exscientia makes 10 times fewer compounds than the industry average using synthesis-aware, iterative approach with generative AI algorithms.
value_claims.source_quote: Using this synthesis-aware, iterative approach built on AWS, Exscientia makes 10 times fewer compounds than the industry average.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Reduction directly attributed to AI algorithms that generate and select drug candidates, minimizing costly experiments.

value_claims.claim_title: Six AI-designed molecules entered clinical trials
value_claims.claim_description: Six molecules that Exscientia designed using AI have entered clinical trials, demonstrating successful translation from AI design to clinical application.
value_claims.source_quote: Six molecules that Exscientia designed using AI have entered clinical trials.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Molecules explicitly described as designed using AI and progressed to clinical trials.

value_claims.claim_title: Drug discovery timeline reduced from 4.5 years to 12-15 months
value_claims.claim_description: Exscientia's Centaur AI platform cuts the industry average timeline from 4.5 years to just 12 to 15 months for generating optimised molecules meeting clinical trial criteria.
value_claims.source_quote: It achieves it in revolutionary timescales, cutting the industry average timeline from 4.5 years to just 12 to 15 months.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Timeline reduction explicitly attributed to the Centaur AI platform generating highly optimised molecules.

value_claims.claim_title: First AI-designed drug candidate created in 12 months
value_claims.claim_description: Exscientia's first AI-designed molecule for Sumitomo Pharma took just 12 months to discover and represents the first ever AI-designed drug candidate to enter clinical trials.
value_claims.source_quote: It took just 12 months to discover and represents the first ever AI-designed drug candidate to enter clinical trials.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Molecule explicitly described as AI-designed and first of its kind to enter clinical trials.

value_claims.claim_title: 75% prediction success rate for drug ligand design
value_claims.claim_description: Exscientia achieved an automated and adaptive methodology for designing drug ligands to multitarget profiles with a 75% prediction success rate using machine learning algorithms.
value_claims.source_quote: The outcome was an automated and adaptive methodology for designing drug ligands to multitarget profiles with a 75% prediction success rate.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Success rate directly attributed to machine learning algorithms for drug design and testing of novel compounds.

value_claims.claim_title: 24/7 lab operation with minimal human supervision
value_claims.claim_description: Exscientia's lab, orchestrated by AWS microservices with automated robotics, can operate 24/7 with minimal human supervision, reducing make and test timelines.
value_claims.source_quote: Thus, its lab—orchestrated by AWS microservices—can operate 24/7 with minimal human supervision
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AWS microservices orchestrate the automated lab operations, with AI contributing to the overall automation capability.

value_claims.claim_title: Two-thirds reduction in early-stage drug development costs
value_claims.claim_description: Using automated computer algorithms to detect patterns in big, complex datasets can slash up to two-thirds off the cost of early-stage drug development.
value_claims.source_quote: Using automated computer algorithms to detect patterns in big, complex datasets can slash up to two-thirds off the cost of early-stage drug development
value_claims.quote_location: Where next for AI approaches section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cost reduction directly attributed to automated computer algorithms (AI) detecting patterns in datasets.

context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia operates in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sector, focusing on drug discovery and development.
context_claims.source_quote: Exscientia is a technology-driven drug design and development company, committed to creating more effective medicines for patients, faster.

context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia's AI platform is applied in the research and development function, specifically in drug discovery and design processes.
context_claims.source_quote: Exscientia's platform uses generative AI models and the scalability and flexibility of AWS to securely, quickly and efficiently design drug candidates

context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia was founded in 2012 and has grown from five employees to 450-strong team operating in more than 20 countries.
context_claims.source_quote: Founded in 2012, Exscientia has quickly established itself as a leader in harnessing AI to identify promising drug molecules

context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia went public on the Nasdaq stock market in October 2021, raising $510 million in the largest IPO for a European biotech company.
context_claims.source_quote: In October 2021, Exscientia achieved a significant milestone by going public on the Nasdaq stock market, raising $510 million

context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia has grown to a 450-strong team operating in more than 20 countries with six established global offices.
context_claims.source_quote: From modest beginnings with just five employees, today Exscientia's 450-strong team operates in more than 20 countries and has six established global offices.

context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia is headquartered at the Oxford Science Park in the UK, with operations spanning England, Scotland, Austria, and the US.
context_claims.source_quote: Headquartered at the Oxford Science Park in the UK, Exscientia's operations span across England, Scotland, Austria, and the US.

context_claims.claim_title: Mission to transform drug invention with AI and automation
context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia's mission is to transform the way the biopharma industry invents impactful medicines by pairing human science with AI/ML and experimental automation.
context_claims.source_quote: Our mission is to transform the way the biopharma industry invents impactful medicines, by pairing the best available human science, ingenuity and AI/ML tech expertise

context_claims.claim_title: Centaur AI platform for drug discovery
context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia's Centaur AI platform generates highly optimised molecules that meet multiple pharmacology criteria required for clinical trials.
context_claims.source_quote: Exscientia's Centaur AI platform exemplifies the company's innovative approach to drug discovery. Not only does the platform generate highly optimised molecules

context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia has developed an internal pipeline focused on oncology, while its partnered pipeline extends to many other therapeutic areas.
context_claims.source_quote: We have developed an internal pipeline focused on oncology, while our partnered pipeline extends to many other therapeutic areas.

context_claims.claim_title: Strategic partnerships with major pharmaceutical companies
context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia has established collaborations with industry giants such as Sanofi, Bristol Myers Squibb, and Sumitomo Pharma, alongside academic partnerships.
context_claims.source_quote: The collaborations were with industry giants such as Sanofi and Bristol Myers Squibb, alongside academic partnerships with institutions like the University of Oxford

context_claims.claim_title: First AI-designed drug entered clinical trials
context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia was the first company to progress AI-designed small molecules into a clinical setting, pioneering the use of AI in drug discovery.
context_claims.source_quote: we pioneered the use of AI in drug discovery as the first company to progress AI-designed small molecules into a clinical setting.

context_claims.claim_title: Built on Amazon Web Services infrastructure
context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia's platform is built on AWS, using AI/ML services, Amazon Bedrock for large language models, and microservices for lab orchestration.
context_claims.source_quote: Built on Amazon Web Services (AWS), Exscientia's innovative DMTL solution incorporates in silico design—using generative AI algorithms to design compounds in the cloud

context_claims.claim_description: Exscientia operates an AutomationStudio with state-of-the-art robotics for molecular synthesis and testing, integrated with its DesignStudio.
context_claims.source_quote: The company's UK based AutomationStudio then synthesises and tests drug candidates that were identified by its DesignStudio as having high potential

context_claims.claim_description: BBSRC provided crucial early funding starting with a pathfinder grant in 2009 and £150,000 follow-on-fund that supported Exscientia's formation.
context_claims.source_quote: BBSRC supported this work with a small pathfinder grant, awarded in 2009 for the experimental proof of concept for drug design.
